ygData.subject: Overcamping the sarnak fort...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, all. My main character is a 30th level ranger on the Tarew Marr server, and I ve soloing the sarnak fort for the last few levels (since about 24th)...so
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, all. My main character is a 30th level ranger on the Tarew Marr server,
and I've soloing the sarnak fort for the last few levels (since about
24th)...so all in all, probably about a month's worth of play time for me.
For the most part, the fort has been really quiet. More often than not, I'm
the only one fighting there, but over the last few days, the sarnak fort has
become an extremely popular spot for some reason and the place is now
overcamped with groups that end up fighting over the sarnaks that spawn
there.

So I'm trying to figure out where to take my ranger next for when I'm
soloing. When I'm in a group, I have a number of places to go, but I can't
figure out what my next step should be for soloing. Would anybody care to
share some suggestions, please?

Chris
